question: The next term of the sequence 1, 2, 5, 26, â€¦ is:
explanation:
The series is based on following pattern :
$latex \\left ( 1 \\right )^{2}+1=2$
$latex \\left ( 2 \\right )^{2}+1=5$
$latex \\left ( 5 \\right )^{2}+1=26$
$latex \\left ( 26 \\right )^{2}+1=677$
Therefore, the next number of this series will be 677.
Hence option [B] is correct.
